mapper.update: update t_user_info set USER_NAME_ = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_WORD_ = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERE_EMAIL_ = #{usereEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_MOBILE_ = #{userMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEX_ = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_ROLE_ID_ = #{sysRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_STATUS_ = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REGISTER_TIME_ = #{registerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_IP_ = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME_ = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELTE_FLAG_ = #{delteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, USER_NAME_, PASS_WORD_, USERE_EMAIL_, USER_MOBILE_, SEX_, SYS_ROLE_ID_, USER_STATUS_, REGISTER_TIME_, LAST_LOGIN_IP_, LAST_LOGIN_TIME_, DELTE_FLAG_ from t_user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
